parameters.name: Body1
parameters.description: First body to check for interference

parameters.name: Body2
parameters.description: Second body to check for interference

parameters.name: CoincidentInterference
parameters.description: True to check for coincident interference, false to not

parameters.name: Body1InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that have interfered from the first body with the second body

parameters.name: Body2InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that have interfered from the second body with the first body

title: IModeler.CheckInterference
signature:
System.Boolean CheckInterference( 
   System.Object
Body1
,
   System.Object
Body2
,
   System.Boolean
CoincidentInterference
,
   out System.Object
Body1InterferedFaceArray
,
   out System.Object
Body2InterferedFaceArray
,
   out System.Object
IntersectedBodyArray
)

parameters.name: Body1
parameters.description: First body to check for interference

parameters.name: Body2
parameters.description: Second body to check for interference

parameters.name: CoincidentInterference
parameters.description: True to check for coincident interference, false to not

parameters.name: Body1InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that have interfered from the first body with the second body

parameters.name: Body2InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that have interfered from the second body with the first body

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
Each body must be transformed in the coordinate space of the top-level assembly so that it is positioned the same with respect to the other bodies as it is in assembly space.
To align the two bodies, apply the transformation from
IComponent2::Transform2
using
IBody2::ApplyTransform
.
